segments.text: Oh, this kitchen is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is just pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so disgusted by the mess, it's just unacceptable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh those kids, they're being so sneaky and mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for cookies like he owns the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how careless everyone is being, it's just so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really upset by the lack of awareness and responsibility in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean up this mess and take control of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't stand to see a kitchen in such a state of disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really upsetting to me, and I hope things get cleaned up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
